name: Pharaoh's Gate
description:
Overview

You, Pharaoh, are in charge of your town of Egyptians! Give them resources to build their city by opening the gate to allow the mummies in! When the Egyptians win a fight, they collect the mummy bandages and parts to use for their buildings. Can you keep your town alive until the 10th wave?

System Requirements

Pharaoh's Gate requires the following PC specs:

Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater

Memory: 8GB+ RAM

Operating System: Windows 10 or macOS (Both Intel and Silicon are Supported)

Controls Menu & Game (One Button)

Space - Tap to skip selection / Hold to accept
